headline.main: Extraterritoriality"; Chinese Laws Could Be Substituted by Act of Congress

lead_paragraph: In today's editorial you say: "One hundred years ago * * * the Treaty of Nanking was signed. * * * Out of that treaty came the system of 'extraterritoriality' under which foreigners (Americans included) have enjoyed for a full century special rights in China."
